column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to [[Christopher Tolkien]]'''.<ref name=CG>{{CG|C}}
informing him that the [[Inklings]] propose to consider him a permanent member.

column1: *'''Publication:''' An extract from the letter appeared in [[The Inklings (book)|The Inklings]]
column2: p. 205: "To consider you a permanent member
column3: with right of entry and what not quite independent of my presence or otherwise".
